data: HEM AMB Luspatercept for Beta Thalassemia Cycle 1 (Day of Treatment)
Pre-Treatment Metrics
May proceed with treatment if:
Hemoglobin Less Than or Equal to 115 g/L within 72 hours
Treatment Regimen
Vital Signs prior to each treatment
luspatercept
1 mg/kg, subcutaneous, once, drug form: inj, Use Patient Supply
Additional Orders
Any additional orders will be displayed below. Please review and adjust scheduled administration time as needed
24 to 72 hours prior to Day 1 of next Treatment Cycle draw labs
Pre-Treatment Lab
CBC and Differential
Blood, routine, collection T;N, once, Order for future visit
Electrolytes Panel Outpatient (Na, K)
Blood, routine, collection T;N, once, Order for future visit

Blood, routine, collection T;N, once, Order for future visit

Blood, routine, collection T;N, once, Order for future visit
AST
Blood, routine, collection T;N, once, Order for future visit

Blood, routine, collection T;N, once, Order for future visit
Infusion Chemotherapy Visit
Next Available Appointment, Chair Time: 55 minutes, Nurse Time: 50 minutes, Luspatercept injection
